form.official-title: To reduce the period of the availability of allowances for former Speakers of the House of Representatives to one year, beginning on the date of the expiration of an individual’s service as Speaker.

section.header: Timing of availability of allowances for former Speakers

subsection.header: 1-Year Period of Availability; Period To Begin Upon Expiration of Service as Speaker

paragraph.text:
Section 4 of such House Resolution (
2 U.S.C. 31b–4 ) is amended by striking the expiration of his term of office as a Representative in Congress and inserting the expiration of the individual’s service as Speaker of the House of Representatives .

subparagraph.text: by striking his incumbency in office as a Representative in Congress and as Speaker and inserting the individual’s incumbency in office as Speaker; and
by striking the expiration of the term of office of the Speaker as a Representative in Congress and inserting the expiration of the individual’s service as Speaker.

section.text: The amendments made by this Act shall apply with respect to any individual who is a former Speaker of the House of Representatives at any time before, on, or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
